node.title: New Zealand Opposition Leader ousted hours after demoting rival
node.alt: A middle aged woman with blonde hair wears a scarf.
node.description: A year after suffering a huge election loss, New Zealand's conservative Opposition Leader Judith Collins is oustedÂ by her colleagues.
node.content:
["A year after suffering a huge election loss, New Zealand's conservative Opposition Leader Judith Collins has been ousted\u00a0by her caucus.", "Ms Collins was in the role\u00a0for\u00a0a tumultuous 16 months.", "She never polled well as leader of the National party, even after Labour\u00a0Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern's popularity began to fade in recent months as a coronavirus outbreak took hold in Auckland.", "Rumours about a possible move against Ms\u00a0Collins had been circulating for weeks.", "But she ended up making the first move on Wednesday night by stripping former leader and potential rival Simon Bridges of his portfolios.", "Ms Collins said she made the move because she had found out for the first time that Mr Bridges made inappropriate comments to female colleague Jacqui Dean about five years ago at a function.\u00a0", "", "
Judith Collins was the National party's second female leader.(AP: Robert Kitchin/Pool)
", "Other National MPs\u00a0weren't impressed with the move by Ms Collins, pointing out that Mr\u00a0Bridges had apologised at the time.", "The new National party leader will be chosen next week. Possible contenders include Mr Bridges, former Air New Zealand chief executive Christopher Luxon and former police officer Mark Mitchell.", "Ms Collins plans to stay on in parliament as MP for the Auckland district of Papakura.", "Ms Collins said it had required stamina and resolve to take on the leadership during \"the worst of times\".", "\"If I hadn't, then I felt that I wouldn't deserve the role.\"", "Ms Dean said Mr Bridges had apologised at the time but the incident \"continued to play on my mind\".", "Ms Ardern last year won a second term in a landslide of historic proportions.", "The popularity of her Labour Party has slipped since then, but most of the gains have gone to the libertarian ACT Party, while Ms\u00a0Collins and the National party have continued to languish in opinion polls.", "AP"]
